origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'CreditAPI.get_bank_rankings', 'description': 'This function provides the rankings of major banks based on their credit fund allocations within a specified time period.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'time_period', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The time period for which the data is requested, e.g., last_year, last_quarter.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'bank_rankings', 'description': 'The rankings of major banks based on their credit fund allocations.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
然后，获取主要银行在信贷资金投放上的排名。
